items.title: The Outlook of the AI Sector, Including Microsoft (MSFT), Is Positive, Analyst Says
items.description: AI-oriented companies appear to be performing “overwhelmingly” well, Gabelli Portfolio Manager John Felton recently told Schwab Network. Among the companies well-positioned to benefit from the latter trend are Microsoft (MSFT) and Oracle (ORCL), he suggested. A “Disconnect” Between the Performance and Stock Prices of AI Names Although AI-oriented stocks in general and the sector’s “high […]

items.title: Apple Takes the Biggest Hit of the "Magnificent Seven" in Response to Trump Tariffs
items.description: Tariffs will be the focus, but Apple's issues predate the shocking tariff announcement on April 2.
